last_episode_to_air.name: The Night Ward
last_episode_to_air.overview: Stacey Hayes manages an abandoned hospital's renovation and witnesses alarming paranormal events; the investigators she calls for help then get trapped and attacked by the forces.

name: Paranormal Witness
overview: A tense, filmic and high-octane drama-documentary series that brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation. Using a mixture of intimate first-hand testimony and grittily realistic drama, the audience is transported into a world turned upside down by extraordinary and terrifying events.

episodes.name: Emily the Imaginary Friend; The Lost Girl
episodes.overview: A 5-year-old girl in Baltimore befriends an invisible girl named Emily, a seemingly harmless playmate who becomes malevolent toward the girl's family, and a mother and daughter encounter a mysterious girl in Florida in the debut of the documentary series exploring personal accounts of paranormal experiences.

episodes.name: Haunted Highway; Kentucky UFO Chase
episodes.overview: A mysterious disappearance on a California road leads one family to make a ghostly sighting.

episodes.name: The Poltergeist; Watched in the Wilderness
episodes.overview: A family is confronted by a vicious poltergeist in their new California home; a former deputy sheriff's encounter with a mysterious beast in the wilderness of Oregon is detailed.

episodes.name: The Dangerous Game; Trumbull County UFO
episodes.overview: A night of UFO sightings in Trumbull County, Ohio, is documented on police radio recordings; a malevolent spirit summoned via a Ouija board terrorizes a young family.

episodes.name: The Rain Man
episodes.overview: In 1983, a Monroe County Prison convict allowed out of jail to attend his grandfather's funeral finds himself the victim of demonic possession giving him the power to make it rain indoors.

episodes.name: Man in the Attic
episodes.overview: A young mother must protect her children from the unruly spirit that's haunting her house.

episodes.name: Brooklyn Haunting
episodes.overview: A family's scary experiences in a Brooklyn townhouse are detailed

episodes.name: Capitol Theater Haunting
episodes.overview: Recounting strange phenomena at Salt Lake City's Capitol Theatre

episodes.name: The Dybbuk Box
episodes.overview: The origins of a Dybbuk Box, which is said to contain a malevolent spirit, is investigated by its owner after it supposedly created havoc in the lives of two previous owners.

episodes.name: Lady on the Stairs
episodes.overview: The ghost of a Victorian era mother may be haunting the home of newlyweds.

episodes.name: The Apartment
episodes.overview: A single mom has troubling nightmares after moving into an apartment complex in California.

episodes.name: The Real Haunting in Connecticut
episodes.overview: A family learns that their new Connecticut home was once a funeral parlor, and soon strange incidents occur within its walls.

episodes.name: Fox Hollow Farm
episodes.overview: A family fears their Indianapolis mansion is haunted by the serial killer who previously resided there.

episodes.name: The Abduction
episodes.overview: The story of an alleged alien abduction is told by the people who were involved.

episodes.name: The Cabin/Ghost in the Garden
episodes.overview: A creature with 14 inch feet is tracked to a cabin in the woods of London, Ohio; and in North Carolina, a man claims to see an apparition of a red haired girl running across his backyard.

episodes.name: The Good Skeleton/Hollywood Sign Haunting
episodes.overview: A group of hikers recount their encounter in the Hollywood Hills with a veiled lady wearing a white dress. Also: a California family believes their old farm cottage is protected by something otherworldly.

episodes.name: The Tenants
episodes.overview: The story of newlyweds in Chicago who come to believe their home is haunted and uncover disturbing information about the former occupants.

episodes.name: The Long Island Terror
episodes.overview: Season 3 begins with the story of a firefighter's widow who feared for the safety of her daughters after unknowingly purchasing a home that once belonged to devil worshipers.

episodes.name: The Lost Boy
episodes.overview: A couple with no children feel like they are being haunted by the son they never had.

episodes.name: The Curse of Lonergan Farm
episodes.overview: Three brothers share their experience of reuniting on a family farm and the disturbing memories they each encountered from their childhood.

episodes.name: Dining With the Dead
episodes.overview: The owners of a restaurant in El Paso are convinced that during renovations to the place they inadvertently opened a portal to the spirit world

episodes.name: Deliver Us From Evil
episodes.overview: A devout Baptist family from Indiana's alleged battle with demonic forces is recalled.

episodes.name: The Hospital Hauntings
episodes.overview: Medical professionals from different hospitals in the U.S. reveal their alleged encounters with ghosts.

episodes.name: The Manson Curse
episodes.overview: A newly built home in California becomes a hotbed of paranormal activity, the spirits in question turn out to be the victims of Charles Manson and his cult.

episodes.name: The Bad Man
episodes.overview: A family who moves into a home in a small southern town experience activity caused by a malevolent entity named "The Bad Man" who in life was a child molester.

episodes.name: The Wolf Pack
episodes.overview: Five werewolves hold a family hostage in their own home.

episodes.name: The Saint of Death
episodes.overview: An innocent man is haunted by the face of the saint of the criminal underworld.

episodes.name: The Lynchville Secret
episodes.overview: A ghostly mayor from the Wild West battles a mother and her daughters.

episodes.name: The House on the Lake
episodes.overview: The story of a property developer who turned an old lakeside mansion into apartments unaware that the home was once used as a refuge for tuberculosis sufferers in the 1920s.

episodes.name: A Ghostly Affair
episodes.overview: An academic and his wife buy a Southern home only to learn that a jilted socialite committed suicide there and is now believed to haunt the house.

episodes.name: Through the Eyes of a Killer
episodes.overview: The story of a psychic detective who helped track down a serial killer in New Jersey.

episodes.name: The Innocent
episodes.overview: A family believe they are being haunted by a homicidal foster father and a sister trying to prove she's innocent of murdering her brother.

episodes.name: The Coven
episodes.overview: The story of a coven of witches who supposedly trapped people in a Southern plantation house that's now allegedly haunted.

episodes.name: The Visitors
episodes.overview: Bill Vaile, a former NASA engineer comes face to face with the paranormal after witnessing what looked like an exorcism while at a job site.

episodes.name: The Harpy
episodes.overview: A spirit masquerades as a child.

episodes.name: The Exorcist
episodes.overview: An exorcist is schooled in the ancient procedure at the Vatican in Rome.

episodes.name: The Rendelsham Files
episodes.overview: Senior American airmen see alien crafts near a nuclear base in Suffolk, England.

episodes.name: The Motel
episodes.overview: In the Season 4 premiere, the owners of an abandoned motel are pushed to the brink of evil.

episodes.name: Nightmare on Chestnut Street
episodes.overview: Three female college students claim that they are being terrorized by a demon woman hell-bent on tearing their lives apart.

episodes.name: The Molech
episodes.overview: A Pennsylvania politician finds himself doing battle with the ghost of a murderous doctor that haunts his home, and also an ancient pagan god that the doctor once worshipped.

episodes.name: Suzy Doll
episodes.overview: A family claim they are being torn apart by a life-size doll, which they fear is possessed and after their 6-year-old daughter's soul.

episodes.name: Poppy's Revenge
episodes.overview: A woman who is consumed by guilt over her grandfather's death believes he is haunting her and her family.

episodes.name: The Dark Pond
episodes.overview: A family are fearful of what they describe as a darkness that lurks beneath the inky water of a pond at the back of their property.

episodes.name: Demon House
episodes.overview: A family's dream "forever" home turns into a nightmare when they discover satanic symbols carved into the floorboards and start to believe that a dark, terrifying demon is after one of their souls.

episodes.name: Sacred Ground
episodes.overview: A stroke victim and her family seek a fresh start in a new country home, but instead end up fighting for their lives and sanity when they encounter what they believe to be a band of terrifying Native American spirits.

episodes.name: The Fireplace
episodes.overview: A woman suspects that something evil is hiding behind a boarded-up fireplace in her apartment in Washington, Mo., which she once thought of as a sanctuary, but now fears is haunted by a witch.

episodes.name: The Real Conjuring
episodes.overview: The parents of five girls claim that malevolent forces terrorized them physically and even put a life-threatening curse on the family, which resulted in a near-fatal incident.

episodes.name: When Hell Freezes Over
episodes.overview: Three brokenhearted women renting an old house together seek a fresh start, but instead get what they believe is a supernatural tormentor who is preaching about hell and brimstone.

episodes.name: Beneath the Rock
episodes.overview: The story of eight Marines who were sent to guard an ancient and much fought-over outpost in Afghanistan, where they claim they faced a ghostly enemy.

episodes.name: Ashes to Ashes
episodes.overview: In the Season 4 finale, a couple feel blessed to move into a home that once belonged to their daughter's great-grandmother. That is, until they come to fear that another deceased relative wants them gone.

episodes.name: Voodoo Preacher
episodes.overview: Author Harper Lee once traveled to Alabama to research an enigmatic preacher accused of murder, and writer Jenny Scott follows in her footsteps.

episodes.name: They Are Mine
episodes.overview: Three young college students recall moving into a rental property in a rundown Savannah neighborhood and coming face-to-face with the ghost of a demented crack fiend.

episodes.name: From H.E.L.L.
episodes.overview: Life turns hellish for three young girls from a Hispanic family after they break the rules when playing with a Ouija board.

episodes.name: The Contract
episodes.overview: A loving Christian family are shocked to discover that their eldest son has entered into a deadly contract with the devil, which is why a mysterious and evil "Tall Man" is stalking their home.

episodes.name: Zozo
episodes.overview: A war veteran takes a new job in Lawton, Okla., but the fresh start that he and his brothers decide to make together turns nightmarish when a malignant demon known as the Zozo enters the picture.

episodes.name: The Mothman Curse
episodes.overview: A young couple on a sightseeing trip to Point Pleasant enters an old munitions bunker and unwittingly awakens the infamous Mothman - a harbinger of doom that follows them home and subjects them to a reign of terror.

episodes.name: Nebraska Fiend
episodes.overview: The Pracht family encounters 19th-century murderer Stephen Richards in their new home in the plains of Nebraska.

episodes.name: The Pit
episodes.overview: When a woman rents out the dilapidated guesthouse of her new home after covering up bullet holes and a mysterious hole in the floorboards, strange events start to occur.

episodes.name: The Jail
episodes.overview: Detention officer Jay Yates works the night shift at the infamous Estrella Jail, where a sinister spirit is driving both inmates and officers to insanity and death.

episodes.name: The Ranch
episodes.overview: Wolf-like creatures stalk the Bilstein family at their desolate Texas ranch with a horrifying history.

episodes.name: The Hotel
episodes.overview: Guest after guest flees an old Victorian mansion hotel in the middle of the night, forcing the owners to confront its terrifying history before a local bride's fairytale wedding is ruined by a ghostly watchman.

episodes.name: Mojave Encounter
episodes.overview: A couple camping in the desert see lights in the night sky and figures descending to Earth, and unlock the truth of their alien abduction with hypnotism.

episodes.name: The Night Ward
episodes.overview: Stacey Hayes manages an abandoned hospital's renovation and witnesses alarming paranormal events; the investigators she calls for help then get trapped and attacked by the forces.
